text: Saturday Nights in Marietta is the eleventh annual "Winter Book Project" sponsored by the Minnesota Center for Book Arts in Minneapolis.  Celebrated Minnesota author and poet Robert Bly contributed 15 poems to the project. Each of the poems is accompanied by an original wood engraving or woodcut by one of 15 artists who were invited to visually interpret Bly's poetry. Designed by Amy Brooks Kirkpatrick, this deluxe copy of the book was bound by Minneapolis bookbinder Dennis Ruud, who also fabricated the barn wood box.
description: leather and paper covers, housed in wood and cloth clamshell box; Deluxe edition binding by Dennis Ruud
creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
